com.nordicid.nurapi

Class NurBroadcastFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nordicid.nurapi.NurBroadcastFilter

  • public class NurBroadcastFilter
extends java.lang.Object
    Filter configuration for Broadcast messaging. Filters are set by manually or using createAddressTypeFilter(boolean, int), createHostModeFilter(boolean, int), createIPFilter(java.lang.String, int), createMacFilter(java.lang.String, int), createNameFilter(java.lang.String, int) , createNurVersionFilter(java.lang.String, int), createServerPortFilter(int, int), createStatusFilter(boolean, int) or createVersionFilter(int, int) methods.
    See Also:
    NurApi.beepBroadcast(), NurApi.beepBroadcast(NurBroadcastFilter), NurApi.beepBroadcast(int, int), NurApi.beepBroadcast(NurBroadcastFilter, int, int), NurApi.queryEthDevices(), NurApi.queryEthDevices(NurBroadcastFilter), NurApi.setEthConfigBroadcast(NurEthConfig)

      • createAddressTypeFilter

        public void createAddressTypeFilter(boolean usesDHCPAddressing,
                                    int filterOperation)
        Broadcast filter type: address type.
        Parameters:
        usesDHCPAddressing - When TRUE IP address is figured by using DHCP otherwise NUR module uses static IP definitions.
        filterOperation - (BC_FILTER_OP_EQUAL, BC_FILTER_OP_HIGHER, BC_FILTER_OP_LOWER, BC_FILTER_OP_LIKE)

      • createHostModeFilter

        public void createHostModeFilter(boolean isClient,
                                 int filterOperation)
        Broadcast filter type: host mode.
        Parameters:
        isClient - When TRUE host mode is client otherwise it's server.
        filterOperation - (BC_FILTER_OP_EQUAL, BC_FILTER_OP_HIGHER, BC_FILTER_OP_LOWER, BC_FILTER_OP_LIKE)

      • createStatusFilter

        public void createStatusFilter(boolean isConnected,
                               int filterOperation)
        Broadcast filter type: status.
        Parameters:
        isConnected - Status of the connection, when TRUE status is connected otherwise it's disconnected.
        filterOperation - (BC_FILTER_OP_EQUAL, BC_FILTER_OP_HIGHER, BC_FILTER_OP_LOWER, BC_FILTER_OP_LIKE)
